section.title: XML Schemas
section.para:
In all methods XML-data is used as input and output. The related XML-schemas are located in
http://www.escidoc.de/schemas/rest/container/0.9
http://www.escidoc.de/schemas/soap/container/0.9

These XSDs are used:
container.xsd
container-list.xsd
struct-map.xsd (still in Version 0.4)
